name: 林鳳儀
objective:
讓修過本課程的高階主管獲得下列5個觀念:
(1)Tools for Planning and Control
(2)Cost Information for Decisions
(3)Financial and Non-financial Performance Measurement
(4)Quality and Just in Time
(5) Strategic Investment Decision and Management Control Systems
schedule:
1.Chapter 1 & 2 —Management Accounting: A Tool For Decision Making
2.How Successful Business are Creating Wealth in the New Economy
3.Cost Definition
4.Chapter 3—Activity Cost Analysis and Planning
作業基礎成本制度及作業礎管理
5.Chapter 3-1—Profitability Analysis and Planning
損益兩平分析及成本數量利潤分析
6.Chapter 4—Target Costing and Price Planning
(第1組報告) (評論：第6組)
7.Chapter 5— 價值鏈分析、KPI (第2組報告) (評論：第5組)
8.Chapter 7—Budgetting 預算控制 (第3組報告) (評論：第4組)
9.Chapter 8—Performance Assessment
10.Chapter 8-1—Inventory Valuation Approaches and Just-in-Time Inventory Management
零存貨生產與及時存貨管理(第4組報告) (評論：第3組)
11.Chapter 9—Strategic Decision Making (第5組報告) (評論：第2組)
12.Chapter 13—Profitability Analysis of Strategic Business Segments
13.平衡計分卡與策略地圖  Balanced Scorecard & Strategy Maps (第6組報告) (評論：第1組)
14.Chapter 23— Performance Measurement, Compensation, and Multinational Considerations (Horngren, Cost Accounting 12/e 2006) (pp759-764, pp791-813) (評論：第3組)
管理控制制度、績效衡量與獎酬(第9組報告) (評論：第4組)
15.校外專家演講：X月X日, 2008年
16.期末考時間：1月14日, 2009年
scorePolicy:
Your performance will be evaluated in accordance with the following criteria:
1.Class Participation, Presentation  50﹪
2.期末考(Closed Book)                50﹪
P.S:
(1) 本課程共分9個Topics(請參閱課程綱要及進度)的分組報告,每組約有7位成員,但須注意每組成員裡商學背景者只限2至3位。
報告組: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 (30分鐘)
評論組: 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 1, 2, 3, 4 (10分鐘)
(2) 期末考得分未達20﹪以上者，學期成績不及格。
materials:

2003 3/e South-Western Co., (新月書局代理)
參考書目：
Horngren, Datar & Foster  Cost Accounting a Managerial Emphasis, 2006 12/e Prentice Hall Co., (新月書局代理)
(2) 李宗黎、林蕙真 合著 成本與管理會計學新論93年第2版(金華科技圖書公司經銷)
(3) 鄭丁旺、汪泱若、張錫惠合著 成本與管理會計(自行出版)
